verses.verse: How <S%H349><s%> doth the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H910>solitary,<s%> that was <S%H7227>full<s%> of <S%H5971>people!<s%> how is she <S%H1961>become<s%> as a <S%H490>widow!<s%> she that was <S%H7227>great<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H8282>princess<s%> among the <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> how is she <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H4522>tributary!<s%>

She weepeth <S%H1058>sore<s%> <S%H1058><s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and her <S%H1832>tears<s%> are <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H3895>cheeks:<s%> among <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> her <S%H157>lovers<s%> she hath <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> her: <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H7453>friends<s%> have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with her, they are <S%H1961>become<s%> her <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> is gone into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> because of <S%H4480>affliction,<s%> <S%H6040><s%> and because of <S%H4480>great<s%> <S%H7230><s%> <S%H5656>servitude:<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> she <S%H4672>findeth<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4494>rest:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H7291>persecutors<s%> <S%H5381>overtook<s%> her <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4712>straits.<s%>

The <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> do <S%H57>mourn,<s%> because <S%H4480>none<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to the solemn <S%H4150>feasts:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H8179>gates<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate:<s%> her <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H584>sigh,<s%> her <S%H1330>virgins<s%> are <S%H3013>afflicted,<s%> and <S%H1931>she<s%> is in <S%H4843>bitterness.<s%>

Her <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H1961>are<s%> the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> her <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H7951>prosper;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3013>afflicted<s%> her <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of her <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> her <S%H5768>children<s%> are <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6862>enemy.<s%>

And <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1926>beauty<s%> is <S%H3318>departed:<s%> her <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H1961>become<s%> like <S%H354>harts<s%> that <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> and they are <S%H1980>gone<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuer.<s%>

Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and of her <S%H4788>miseries<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her pleasant <S%H4262>things<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> she <S%H1961>had<s%> in the <S%H4480>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> when her <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6862>enemy,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> did <S%H5826>help<s%> her: the <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, and did <S%H7832>mock<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> her <S%H4868>sabbaths.<s%>

Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> hath grievously <S%H2398>sinned;<s%> <S%H2399><s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> she <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H5206>removed:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3513>honored<s%> her <S%H2151>despise<s%> her, <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H7200>seen<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H584>sigheth,<s%> and <S%H7725>turneth<s%> <S%H268>backward.<s%>

Her <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> is in her <S%H7757>skirts;<s%> she <S%H2142>remembereth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> her last <S%H319>end;<s%> therefore she came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6382>wonderfully:<s%> she had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5162>comforter.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6040>affliction:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> hath <S%H1431>magnified<s%> himself.

The <S%H6862>adversary<s%> hath spread <S%H6566>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her pleasant <S%H4261>things:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> she hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> that the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into her <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou didst <S%H6680>command<s%> that they should <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into thy <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> her <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H584>sigh,<s%> they <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3899>bread;<s%> they have <S%H5414>given<s%> their pleasant <S%H4262>things<s%> for <S%H400>meat<s%> to <S%H7725>relieve<s%> the <S%H5315>soul:<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5027>consider;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I am <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H2151>vile.<s%>

Is it <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> you, <S%H3605>all<s%> ye that pass <S%H5674>by?<s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H5027>behold,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> there <S%H3426>be<s%> any <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> like unto my <S%H4341>sorrow,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5953>done<s%> unto me, <S%H834>wherewith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3013>afflicted<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

From <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4791><s%> hath he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> into my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and it prevaileth <S%H7287>against<s%> them: he hath <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> for my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> he hath <S%H7725>turned<s%> me <S%H268>back:<s%> he hath <S%H5414>made<s%> me <S%H8074>desolate<s%> and <S%H1739>faint<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> is <S%H8244>bound<s%> by his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> they are <S%H8276>wreathed,<s%> and come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H6677>neck:<s%> he hath made my <S%H3581>strength<s%> to <S%H3782>fall,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> me into their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> from whom I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> <S%H3808><s%> to rise <S%H6965>up.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath trodden under <S%H5541>foot<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H47>mighty<s%> men in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of me: he hath <S%H7121>called<s%> an <S%H4150>assembly<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me to <S%H7665>crush<s%> my young <S%H970>men:<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath <S%H1869>trodden<s%> the <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> as in a <S%H1660>winepress.<s%>

For <S%H5921><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1058>weep;<s%> mine <S%H5869>eye,<s%> mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> runneth <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5162>comforter<s%> that should <S%H7725>relieve<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me: my <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H1961>are<s%> <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed.<s%>

Zion <S%H6726><s%> spreadeth <S%H6566>forth<s%> her <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> her: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> concerning <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> that his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> should be round <S%H5439>about<s%> him: <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> as a menstruous <S%H5079>woman<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> them.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against his <S%H6310>commandment:<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> my <S%H4341>sorrow:<s%> my <S%H1330>virgins<s%> and my young <S%H970>men<s%> are <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

I <S%H7121>called<s%> for my <S%H157>lovers,<s%> but <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H7411>deceived<s%> me: my <S%H3548>priests<s%> and mine <S%H2205>elders<s%> gave up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3588>while<s%> they <S%H1245>sought<s%> their <S%H400>meat<s%> to <S%H7725>relieve<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H5315>souls.<s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I am in <S%H6862>distress:<s%> my <S%H4578>bowels<s%> are <S%H2560>troubled;<s%> mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me; <S%H3588>for<s%> I have grievously <S%H4784>rebelled:<s%> <S%H4784><s%> <S%H4480>abroad<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H7921>bereaveth,<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> there is as <S%H4194>death.<s%>

They have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H584>sigh:<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me: <S%H3605>all<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of my <S%H7451>trouble;<s%> they are <S%H7797>glad<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H6213>done<s%> it: thou wilt <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou hast <S%H7121>called,<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> like unto <S%H3644>me.<s%>

Let <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; and <S%H5953>do<s%> unto them, <S%H834>as<s%> thou hast <S%H5953>done<s%> unto me <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H585>sighs<s%> are <S%H7227>many,<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1742>faint.<s%>
